programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep13
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3784
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep199
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1900
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1034
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: My Indian Boyfriend
programme.desc: This is a love story between a Hong Kong girl and an Indian boy and is the first Bollywood movie to be made in Hong Kong. It encapsulates the conflicts caused by discrimination as well as differences in social-cultural background, lifestyle and family values between the races. The movie also combines tears, joy and laughter with song and dance.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tangs demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tangs strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Incredible
programme.desc: Middle-aged and retired superhero couple, Huan (Gazer Man) and Red (Aroma Woman), settles into a contented life in a remote village. They find it hard to contain their powers though, and are bored by the uneventful life. When they hear a world martial arts contest is to be held in their village, both are itching to make their long-awaited comeback!

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kongs elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Longs daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: I Love You, You're Perfect, Now Change!
programme.desc: Catch this comedy-musical adapted from the Broadway classic I LOVE YOU, YOURE PERFECT, NOW CHANGE consisting of 12 independent stories from the viewpoints of individuals, families and societies all exploring the timeless theme of love!

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: Eternal Wave
programme.desc: Lin Xiang is a spy trying to rebuild an underground informant network in Shanghai after the Japanese Occupation. He meets a simple but righteous girl who acts as his wife in the secret mission. When Lin is captured after his identity was revealed, his wife comes to save him but can they escape from the foes?

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Hello Stranger
programme.desc: This is a Thai romantic comedy. The story portrays a young Thai man and woman who meet by coincidence while on vacation in South Korea. They decide to tour the country together while keeping their names a secret from each other. From unwillingly at first, then become best friends and fall in love finally.

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as "Magic Hands" Ken, a legendary gambling maestro who is forced out of retirement when his daughter's safety is compromised by an international gambling mafia. In order to save her, Ken and his new protg Cool must work together to expose the evil mastermind by challenging him to a high stakes head-to-head battle of cards.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Kung Fu Monster
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, the Bruneian Empire offers a monster as a gift to the nation. Imperial guard Ocean is tasked to train it, but realizing it is a kind creature by nature, he releases it secretly so that it will not become a killing beast. His action prompts a frenzy hunt for the monster when the palace puts a hefty bounty for its return

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: A Hong Kong cop is assigned to escort an important witness from the Philippines, only to find himself teaming up with a local cop to bring down a wicked crime syndicate.

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Ah Chiao, a village girl stranded in the city, befriends a kind-hearted tramp and a retired actor. They are poor but happy, though Ah Chiaos fortune change for the better when she becomes a singer. However, she soon learns that money cannot buy one happiness...

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past 10 years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brothers Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his peoples livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Shaolin Abbot
programme.desc: Monk Chi San is sent by his Shaolin Master to learn a special kung fu from a Wu Dang priest. He gets embroiled in the fight between the Qing and Ming camps and has to gather disciples to rebuild the burnt Shaolin temple at the same time.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Clans of Intrigue
programme.desc: Heroic outlaw Chu Liu Xiang is dining with his friend Monk Wu Hua, when Gong from the Holy Water Palace appears and accuses Chu of stealing the holy water from her Palace and using it for various murders. Chu denies, and is given a month to find the murderer or be killed by Gong. To prove his innocence, Chu decides to investigate the case

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: The Champion
programme.desc: After years in prison, Lu Hu returns home to find himself set up by his ruthless brother Piao, who has taken over the family coal mine business and imprisoned their sister. Hu takes down Piao and saves his sister but their coal mine falls into the hands of a Japanese gang, which Hu and his sister must fight in order to get it back.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: General Feng occupies the city of Shandong, and soldiers and civilians alike welcome him without knowing his tyrannical and lustful nature. His first official business is to inspect the brothels and take the prostitutes home to become his concubines. Feng is finally killed by his officers, but will the new general rule the city differently?

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this young auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Podhuvaga En Manasu Thangam
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Romantic Movie, Starring, Udhayanidhi Stalin, Nivetha Pethuraj, Parthiepan, Soori, Mayilsamy,Rajendran & Others

programme.desc: Tamil political-drama movie, starring, Vijay Sethupathi, Aishwarya Rajesh, Munishkanth, and Vela Ramamoorthy

programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevans successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.desc: Formula Racing - The Racers are turned into babies and Dastardly is stuck as their babysitter. Babies or not, the need for speed is an undeniable urge, much to Dastardly's regret.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Unraceable - Dastardly is banned by race owner P.T. Barnstorm from racing for habitual and dangerous cheating. Dastardly is forced to go to an employment agency and take a number of other jobs, all of which he is comically unsuited for.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Sister Twister - Pandora switches places with her twin sister Penny in order to steal a prize for good sportsmanship and fair play.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Mars Needs Racers - P.T. Barnstorm's latest money making race event sends the racers off to race on Mars against an evil space tyrant with Earth as the prize.

programme.title: Wacky Races S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Race To The Bottom - As the race continues through the center of the earth to the Land That Time Forgot, the Racers are attacked by dinosaurs but are rescued at the last second by a tribe of Mole People.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep29
programme.desc: Wash Day - Its Wash Day and Gabrielle gets to spend a special time with her Auntie Kayla who combs, shampoos, conditions and detangles Gabrielles hair.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep30
programme.desc: Community Garden Clean-Up - When a windstorm blows everything down in the Community Garden, everybody comes together to help clean it up as the garden belongs to everyone.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.

programme.desc: Waking from Winter - As winter comes to an end, Alaskans journey, hunt, and prepare for spring.

programme.title: Food Factory S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Discover how old world flavour is lovingly baked into rustic and crusty Baltic dark rye bread; sweet and chewy Duo cookies cater to the tastes of chocolate and vanilla lovers alike; tangy Japanese ginger carrot dressing complements Western as well as Asian dishes.

programme.title: Food Factory S2 Ep20
programme.desc: Discover how humble rice and sugar are transformed into a gooey, crunchy marshmallow bar topped with rainbow-coloured chocolate chips; the root, stem and flowery part of a Japanese plant are pureed into a delicate but very spicy sidekick to sushi.

programme.title: Equator From The Air S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Africa - In Africa, Gordon takes to the skies to see how a growing human population is affecting wildlife, from flamingos and elephants in Kenya, to humpback whales off the coast of Gabon.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Michael Palin embarks on a 1000 mile adventure into Iraq, a country he has never been to before. He boards a train in the spectacular snow-capped mountains of Lake Hazar in eastern Turkey, the source of the river Tigris, which Michael will follow until he reaches the Persian Gulf on the southern most coast of Iraq.

programme.title: Food Factory S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Discover how crispy, lip-smacking Kettle potato chips are specially crinkled for maximum dipping power; sweet, melt-in-your-mouth meringue cookies get their delicate texture in an unconventional oven.

programme.title: Food Factory S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Discover how an aromatic blend of exotic spices is packed into pakoras, a mouthwatering, deep-fried Indian fritter; the bakers of decadently custardy Napoleon bars fold thousands of tiny layers into flaky French pastry; fiery jalapeno peppers are added to a creamy, nutty hummus.

programme.title: Dynasties S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chimpanzee - In Senegal, West Africa, live a group of chimpanzees, led by an alpha male named David. He has already been alpha for 3 years - a time when leaders here are usually overthrown. To make matters worse, David has no allies - no-one to help him defend his leadership.

programme.title: Turkey with Simon Reeve S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Gallipoli to the Syrian Border - Simon visits Istanbul and the beaches and crystal clear waters of the Aegean Sea before ending up at the war-torn border with Syria.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Hurricane Sandy hits America, cavers in California are caught in flash floods, and wild winds cause a hot air balloon crash in Canada.

programme.title: Into the Wild Colombia 1 - The Hummingbird’s Quest Ep2
programme.desc: From Colombias high plains of the Pramo to its tropical forests, hummingbirds have evolved into an extraordinary number of species. Whether battling freezing rain or jungle predators, each mother must struggle to build a nest, protect her eggs.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Punks Strike Back Ep4
programme.desc: After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Chile Ep2
programme.desc: Stretching more than 1,000 kilometers west of the Andes Mountains, the Atacama Desert is the worlds driest non-polar region. Here are ominous volcanoes, dramatic erupting geysers, and dazzling colonies of flamingos. And, because of its high altitude and lack of light pollution, Atacama is home to the worlds largest astronomical observatory.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Bolivia Ep3
programme.desc: A rugged, sky-high plain in the remote heart of Bolivia, the Andean Altiplano lays claim to towering snow-capped peaks, glowing multicoloured lagoons, and the worlds largest salt desert. One of the worlds most pristine wilderness frontiers, the Altiplano is also a high-altitude haven for rare Andean wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Skies Ep3
programme.desc: Take to the sky to soar with the Bald Eagle. From Cape Bretons Bras dOr Lake, to the birds overwintering home in the Annapolis Valley, the Eagles raise families, hunt and forage for food, and compete for territory with another bird of prey, the Osprey.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Walking with a Pangolin Ep3
programme.desc: Crush a busy day with the team as they release rehabbed pythons, teach a pangolin how to hunt, and round up a troop of vervet monkeys. Search for a missing bird of prey with Dr. Charlotte, while Dr. Amanda helps a bushpig savaged by poachers dogs.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Island Feast Ep3
programme.desc: Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just cant resist.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.desc: The number one tourist attraction on the island of Hawaii is a volcano called Kilauea. After a sudden collapse of the crater floor, a massive eruption drains the volcano of lava and now Kilauea is silent. Geologist Phillip Ong finally has his chance to explore.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Tides Ep4
programme.desc: Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Chemical Weapons Ep1
programme.desc: Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelopes tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - Defenders of the Reef Ep4
programme.desc: Its summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Pollinators Ep5
programme.desc: The Annapolis Valley is the Wild Wild Easts most important agricultural center. We dive into the hive to explore the complex social structures of hardworking honeybees. The Monarch butterfly has traveled all the way from Mexico to feed off the local milkweed.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Strange Powers Ep2
programme.desc: Examine the lives of creatures with really strange skills. From poison-shooting arachnids to ink-bombing octopuses to bifocal-eyed beetles, these animals use their powers to help them defeat predators and ensure their survival.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight Ep5
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amandas team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centers baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 - A Turtle's Legacy Ep5
programme.desc: The sea turtle is one of the oldest animals on earth. These ancient mariners even pre-date the dinosaurs. They have existed, relatively unchanged, for over 100 million years. But now, all seven of the surviving species are endangered.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Inside Story Ep4
programme.desc: Look behind the scenes and meet the innovative teams working to preserve and protect Kenyas wildlife. Check out Save the Elephants radio-tracking-collar system, a drone that monitors wild dog packs, and a local team of Maasai cheetah trackers.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Cornish king crab is on the menu for Rick as he heads out of Newquay to catch and cook this tasty crustacean. Afterwards, he takes a trip inland to Bodmin Moor to meet Robin Hanbury Tenison, one of the 20th century's last great explorers. His farm is home to one of Cornwall's most ambitious rewilding projects, where Robin's son, Merlin, has recently introduced a pair of wild beavers who are doing their best to restore biodiversity in this corner of Cornwall.

programme.desc: Rick boards the ferry in Penzance to take him to the Isles of Scilly, a group of islands which were once part of Cornwall. And in the world-famous gardens of Tresco, Rick meets a beekeeper attempting to breed a native Scillonian honeybee to deal with the harsh Atlantic climate. This inspires Rick to cook a honey pudding with Cornish ice cream and a butterscotch sauce.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rick Stein's 'journey without maps' takes him through France's eastern border regions of Alsace and Jura home to his favourite French dish, choucroute garni.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver S1 Ep7
programme.desc: It's the final chapter for the remaining cooks as they present their book concept and a range of recipes to the crme de la crme. Who has the ultimate recipe for success?

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down S4 Ep9

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep3
programme.desc: Old Dog, New Tricks \ Snoozie-Hullabaloozie - Tag chooses to pair up with her Grandpaw for the Barker Family Talent Show, and together, they search for their winning talent. \ Tag is surprised to learn that today is the Pawston Snoozie-a-Hullabaloozie. With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Hiding Pirates - Everyone is excited about singing sea shanties in the big Pirate Party in Toyland. But when Scurvy the Parrot arrives at Toy Green all on his own Noddy soon realises that the pirates are missing. Where can they have gone? Noddy uses his best investigating skills of tracking, listening, looking and thinking to follow the clues and find out what's happened to the pirates - not helped by a loudly squawking Scurvy! When he discovers that the pirates have lost their voices from over-practising their new sea shanty, Noddy comes up with an idea for how Scurvy's loud voice can help save the day. Clever Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep3
programme.desc: Garage - The Dinotrux builds a garage where the Reptools can be safe, but D-Structs tries to thwart their efforts by pitting them against one another.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep3
programme.desc: It's A Secret / Queen Of Thighs - Oh cannot keep a secret when Tip tells him she's planning a surprise party/Lucy's Queen of Thighs video goes viral and turns her into a celebrity.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep6
programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep5
programme.desc: The First Picture Show - When Thunk invents the first-ever movie using shadow puppets, everyone in Ahhh! Valley loves it...until they are shocked by the ending.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep8
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S - George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep9
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus - After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep7
programme.desc: The Boss Babysitter - Mom and Dad Templeton do the unthinkable: leave Boss Baby and Tim under the authority of a babysitter!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep8
programme.desc: Into the Belly of the Den of the House of the Nest of Cats - Mom tries to help Tim get over his fear of the neighborhood crazy-cat-lady

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep18
programme.desc: The Beast - Po and team play a game of Pok-ta-pok against a family of armadillos for the opportunity to talk one on one with Zuma, the leader. The game brings out a highly competitive and aggressive side to Blade, known as "The Beast." Back in China, Colin and Weimin find the Pirate Queen and become part of her pirate crew.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep19
programme.desc: An Uphill Battle - The Dragon Knights make a deal for the Storm Wheel but first must obtain the other Storm Wheel from a mysterious mad scientist. Though Mastodon continues to warn the team about the dangers in using the Tianshang Weapons, they use them in a fight against Klaus and Veruca. The clash of the weapons wakes a dormant volcano!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep20
programme.desc: The Mad Scientist - The Mad Scientist turns out to be an ally called Akna, who has a history with Blade's brother Alfie. And Blade learns another truth about her brother and his mission. And in the course of a skirmish with Klaus and Veruca, the weapons change hands again.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep29
programme.desc: Follow The Leader - When Fishlegs discovers a hidden civilization of Albino Night Terrors beneath Dragon's Edge, he must craft an escape plan after they attack the Riders.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep29
programme.desc: Glitter Loss / New Anthem - When Guy Diamond loses his glitter, he and the Snack Pack embark on an epic journey to the fabled fountain of glitter to get his glitter back./ Poppy decides that its time for a new, Bergen-fear-free Troll anthem, so she creates a song competition to see which Troll can write the best new anthem.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep29
programme.desc: Dance Dance Resolution - After reuniting with his parents, King Julien doesn't want them to leave so he recreates a booty-shaking dance recital they had never seen.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep7
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.desc: Follow The Leader - When Fishlegs discovers a hidden civilization of Albino Night Terrors beneath Dragon's Edge, he must craft an escape plan after they attack the Riders.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep5
programme.desc: Akila Says No - When Brian and Cleo try to get Akila to say no, they find themselves face to face with the galaxys grossest outlaws, the scavengers.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep7
programme.desc: Team Building - Ceo, Akila, and Brian must demonstrate they make a great team so Khepra doesnt split them up.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep31
programme.desc: The Journey - A paladinis trapped in a distant Galra outpost

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep32
programme.desc: Tailing A Comet - Team Voltron tracks Lotor and his generals to an isolated storage facility where they catch them in the act of stealing a valuable piece of technology

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep5
programme.desc: New Sponsor/ Cleopatra - Sherman goes gaga when his favorite snack in the world, Guapo Taco Pudding, sponsors the show; beautiful Cleopatra turns out to be a belching queen.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep6
programme.desc: Black Hole/ Winston Churchill - Peabody and Sherman accidentally create a Black Hole after skipping their chores; Winston Churchill runs away to hide in a baby nursery to avoid work.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep5
programme.desc: Stink of Fear: Chapter Five - When Fearless Leader brainwashes Bullwinkle, Rocky must team up with Director Peachfuzz to stop them from making the stinky pie and taking over the world

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep6
programme.desc: The Dark Side of the Moose: Chapter One - When Rocky and Bullwinkle want an interesting story to tell at their upcoming reunion, they accidentally take off for space in a very real rocket

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep5
programme.desc: The Missing Piece / The Scotchman - Archibald goes on a scavenger hunt for a missing puzzle piece. Archibald marches to a creepy house to deliver a package.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep6
programme.desc: Mountain Mayhem / Gator Spinner Max - After winning a citizen swap contest, Archibald moves to a mountain town for a week. Archibald finds a practical use for his pal's wacky invention.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep4
programme.desc: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum - When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep4
programme.desc: This Means Warts - When snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, The Croods launch into the first-ever prank war.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep4
programme.desc: Empty Is The Head - Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep15
programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep4
programme.desc: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep4
programme.desc: Duchess - The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep4
programme.desc: Scraptors - Ty Rux leads the Dinotrux on a nighttime raid to rescue Ton-Ton who's been snatched by a pack of Scraptors and taken to their hive in Scraptor Valley.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep4
programme.desc: Where There's Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep4
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Blue Flash - Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep56
programme.desc: Poppy The Line Dancing Queen - Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep4
programme.desc: Rupert and the Star Child - Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her twinkle'

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep4
programme.desc: Gopher it! / A Glamping We Will Go - When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4
programme.desc: Show Dog, Show \ Keys to Victory - Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sams big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Music Player - Noddy's new music player starts a craze for the latest dance, the Toy Twist. He decides to have a big dance party that night! All his friends are excited apart from Smartysaurus, who can't dance. When the music player goes missing, Noddy must use all his investigative skills of listening, looking and following clues on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to find out who has taken the music player and why. Eventually he realises that Smartysaurus borrowed the game so that she could practise the Toy Twist but it's no good! She still can't master it! Noddy shows her how her own special Dinosaur Dance can make everyone's Toy Twist extra specially fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep4
programme.desc: The Big New Mexico Pepper Hunt - When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep4
programme.desc: African Queen / Mega Snails - The FAST crew is tricked into going to Africa by the Queen of the Banana Slugs for a dangerous journey through the plains in order to save her tribe. // White Shadow is challenged by three over-zealous and over-sized championship sumo wrestler snails to an outrageous wrestling match.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep4
programme.desc: Scraptors - Ty Rux leads the Dinotrux on a nighttime raid to rescue Ton-Ton who's been snatched by a pack of Scraptors and taken to their hive in Scraptor Valley.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep4
programme.desc: Krunkle Krush / Beauty Tip - Tip spies on Oh when he has his first date with a strange Boov named Krunkle./Tip competes against rival Pom Pom Pappernacky in a beauty pageant.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep7
programme.desc: Lucky And The Cowboy Next Door - When the annual roundup and town dance brings cowboy Javier to Miradero Lucky finds a new friend who can teach her and Spirit a new trick.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep8
programme.desc: Lucky And The Pie P.I. - Mysteries collide when horse thieves strike Miradero at the same time as a pie thief strikes the church bake sale while the adults try to keep the horse thieves at bay Lucky is determined to find out who stole the pies.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep7
programme.desc: Eep-Over / Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep8
programme.desc: Mom Genes - When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep10
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes - After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep11
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Soggy Salvation of the Swirling Sweatnami - Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep12
programme.desc: Hang in There, Baby - When Mega Fat CEO Baby claims he has dirt that could get Boss Baby fired, Boss Baby and the team try to find a way to get it first!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep21
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 1 - As the Dragon Knights prepare to battle for the weapons and control of Tikal, Mastodon attempts to teach Po how to access storm powers to use in the fight. Blade comes face to face with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep22
programme.desc: Apok-ta-pokalypse Now Part 2 - The team heads into a final confrontation for the weapons that not only threatens Tikal, but their lives. And Po must share hero duties with Mastodon.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep12
programme.desc: The Liar and The Thief - The team arrives in India where an old friend of Rukhmini can supposedly give them a pendant that will lead to the next Tianshang weapon. But when they arrive, they find that Rukhminis hometown has changed a lot in the thirty years shes been gone, and her old friend Diya might not be willing to help them.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep30
programme.desc: Turn And Burn - Stoick, Hiccup and Snotlout search for Spitelout when he goes missing, and ultimately find him on a distant island battling a fiery Singetail dragon.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep30
programme.desc: Dark Side of the Lagoon / Mr. Glittercakes - When Poppy drops DJ Sukis prized party-making possession in the lagoon, she and her friends must go on a submarine adventure to the lagoon floor in order to find it./When Branch uses an excuse to avoid going to a party- that he has plans with his friend Mr. Glittercakes- Poppy calls him out. But to both Branch and Poppys surprise, it turns out Mr. Glittercakes is real! Who is the mysterious Troll, and why has he chosen to help Branch?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep217
programme.desc: Spot Returns - When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Storm - A powerful storm brings up painful memories of the past and puts everyone in jeopardy in the present.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Maxed Out - Hector finds out Vito has a huge tab at the mercado and Vito offers to pay him back - no matter what!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Sidekickin' Chicken / Silent Fight - After hearing about a contest to find El Falcon's next sidekick, Carl becomes El Pollito and tries to win! Once Carlitos falls asleep, Carl and CJ must conduct all their playing - and fighting - in absolute silence!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Kick Some Bot / Salvador Doggy - Sid faces off against Lisa Loud in the Great Lakes City robotics competition! // When faced with a deadline and no inspiration, Frida tries to use Lalo's paintings as her own!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The Starry Awards / Biorpsgiving - Patrick hosts an award ceremony. // Captain Doug Quasar meets Pat-Tron's robot family.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep257
programme.desc: Handemonium / Breakin' - Plankton's giant Chum Bucket glove runs wild in town, but SpongeBob has a handy friend to help them out. // SpongeBob takes his first break ever at work, but how will he spend his precious time?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248
programme.desc: Squid's on a Bus - Squidward gleefully switches jobs with a bus driver for an easy ride... until SpongeBob and Patrick climb aboard.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Eye of the Hotdog / Patrick Takes the Cake - Craig Mammalton learns what it's like to not be the best at something. // Patrick and a cake hide out in the wilderness.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep516
programme.desc: Grub Snub / She's All Bat - When Leni and her friends start hanging out at Gus's, Lincoln and the gang start a turf war for control. // Lucy gets jealous of Lola's newfound attention after she joins the Mortician's Club.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep517
programme.desc: Much Ado About Noshing / Broadcast Blues - The kids help Dad track down the mystery person who left Lynn's Table a bad review online. // The Action News Team has to cater to Chandler's demands after he buys the club new equipment.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep518
programme.desc: Camped! - When Dad discovers that his childhood camp is closing, he decides to take the family for one final visit. // They soon uncover a map that could lead to a treasure big enough to save it and prove the existence of an old camp legend.

programme.title: The Loud House S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Scales of Justice / Crimes of Fashion - When Lana learns her favorite fish are in jeopardy of losing their home to construction she springs into action. // When Leni gets fired from her job due to missing scarves, Lincoln and Clyde (as Ace and Jack) take on the case.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep242
programme.desc: FarmerBob / Gary & Spot - SpongeBob and Patrick work a day on Old Man Jenkins' farm, much to his dismay. // Sandy narrates the nocturnal adventures of Gary and his secret pal - Spot.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep253
programme.desc: Biddy Sitting - SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep235
programme.desc: Plankton Paranoia / Library Cards - Plankton hasn't tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and that's making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapple's library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Blue Spirit - After Sokka and Katara get sick due to being in the storm, Aang seeks out a cure and discovers he needs some frozen frogs in order to get them cured.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Bad Cluck - A haunted chicken is pestering the Casagrandes - but is he just here for Sergio?

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep523
programme.desc: Diss the Cook / For Sale by Loner - Lincoln is convinced the middle school lunch lady is holding a grudge against him and his older sisters. // Mr. Grouse attempts to find some peace and quiet after moving away from the Louds.

programme.title: The Loud House S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Appetite for Destruction / Frame on You - When Lily starts misbehaving at home, Mom and Dad think her new preschool friends might be the cause. // When Rusty is wrongfully suspended, the Action News Team leaps into action to clear his name.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep224
programme.desc: Squid Noir / Scavenger Pants - When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep249
programme.desc: Sandy's Nutty Nieces / Insecurity Guards - SpongeBob gets in over his head when he volunteers to babysit Sandy's 3 nieces. // SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep174
programme.desc: For Here Or To Go - Plankton wins a free Krabby Patty, and Mr. Krabs will do anything to stop him from collecting.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Shifu's Back - When Shifu throws out his back, Po has to sit in as master of the Jade Palace.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Midnight Stranger - When kung fu is outlawed, Po turns to donning a mask to fight crime.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep207
programme.desc: The Po Who Cried Ghost - Po's worst childhood fears come true when he comes face to face with hopping ghosts!

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Antics on Ice - The Lunacorns on Ice extravaganza is in town, and Skipper's determined to take him as a treat.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep307
programme.desc: King Me / Private and the Winky Factory - King Julien's archrival, Clemson, returns in another attempt to claim the lemur crown. // Private's favorite treat, the Peanut Butter Winky, is going the way of the dinosaur.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Best Foes / Night of the Vesuviuses - Kowalski invents an enemy detector but it doesn't work. Old enemies are now friends & old friends are now enemies. // The annual Zoo Snooze is here! This year the Vesuvius Twins buy up all the tickets. The zoosters plan to exact revenge on the twins.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep307
programme.desc: The Runaway - When Toph discovers a quick way to make cash, Katara disapproves, and the rift between them has disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep308
programme.desc: The Puppetmaster - In a Halloween installment, the gang looks into strange disappearances in a spooky town. There, an old lady named Hama teaches Katara some secret Waterbending techniques.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Nightmares and Daydreams - On the eve of the eclipse, Aang's anxiety gets the better of him. His dreams become nightmares, and soon he can no longer tell dream from reality.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Fight or Flight / Employee of the Month - Best and Bester have to find a smart way to make their flight despite not looking like their passport photos. // Best decides to let his sister win "Employee of the Month" for once, but finds that losing doesn't come naturally.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Stuck Inside / Long Overdue - When Rocky swallows the last piece of their jigsaw puzzle, Best and Bester head into the unknown to retrieve it. // Best and Bester go on a mission to return an overdue library book without being spotted by the scary librarian.

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Chicken Pox / Moppy Dearest - Kyle comes down with the chicken pox, and Fanboy and Chum Chum are certain they can help cure their wizard pal. // Fanboy and Chum Chum are thrilled when their favorite superhero, Man-Arctica, is going to appear at the school dance.
